```{r}
RA <- function(bias){
  choice <- rbinom(1,1,bias)
  return(choice)
}
df <- tibble()
for(t in 1:120) {
  choice <- RA(0.2)
  temp <- tibble(t, choice)
  df <- rbind(df, temp)
}
```
